title: Trinity Seven: Nanatsu no Taizai to Nana Madoushi
original_name: トリニティセブン 七つの大罪と七魔道士
ending_song: "TRINITY×SEVENTH ＋ HEAVEN" by Security Politti [Mira Yamana (Yoko Hikasa) & Akio Fudou (Ryoka Yuzuki)]
sinopse: Arata is set to be expelled! The only way to save himself is to be taught more about the magic archives from the Trinity Seven themselves.
